Description: 具有專業法人機構(如工研院、資策會)或企業組織之相關領導職位/經理人。
EnglishDescription: Holding a leadership position in a professional organization.

Description: 具有(非)營利企業的董/監事會成員、專業委員會成員等之經歷。
EnglishDescription: Serving as an active member of a board of directors for corporate or non-profit organization.

Description: 具有業界或政府機關的諮詢相關職責經歷，並且累計至少兩年。
EnglishDescription: Providing at least 2 years of consulting to the business community or government institutions.

Description: 獲選為專業協(公、學、商、工）會之理監事或專業委員會成員。
EnglishDescription: Elected to a fellowship, or equivalent, of their professional association.

Description: 具有專業領域證照，並且為每年接受教育訓練。
EnglishDescription: Attaining or renewing professional certification or licensure that has a requirement of annual continuing education.
